column5: You will love my home - recently updated throughout to a high standard, located in a very convenient and central, neighborhood. Everything in the house is new, and is well equipped - stove/oven, fridge, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, kettle. Ceiling fans installed in all bedrooms with AC/heat, Wi/Fi internet, TV, Directv Now & Netflix. The great deck & backyard will make you feel right at home. My place is good for couples, solo & business travelers, families (with kids) & groups.
